description: Highly opinionated toolkit for developing fullstack MVP-s quickly and efficiently at Redlionsoft
name: @redlionsoft/fullstacktools

scripts.build:backend: tsc --project backend/tsconfig.json && tsup backend/index.ts --format cjs,esm --target esnext --dts --outDir dist/backend
scripts.build:frontend: tsc --project frontend/tsconfig.json && tsup frontend/index.ts --format cjs,esm --target esnext --dts --outDir dist/frontend
scripts.build:common: tsc --project common/tsconfig.json && tsup common/index.ts --format cjs,esm --target esnext --dts --outDir dist/common
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:common

author: Abel Bodogan
